ehema detkarala thamayi me chithrapataya duwanne.
wides sancharakayin wanodyana narambaa thibenawa - wanajiwi amathi
thawa poth rasakama wisthara idiriyedi dannam.
wepan eka passe welawaka hoya ganna puluwanya.
nathnam ithin anthimata wenne rassawa hamba wena paththen minihek hoyagena bandagena, lamayek hamba wenna aawahama rassawata oona deyak wechchaden kiyala eka adiyakwath gedarin eliyata nothiya inna.
pol gediyak siyayayi.
wiyali deshagunika thaththwayan thula jiwath wana kotin kaha pahathi ya.
kampas ekenam kadda nathiwa ba thamayi.

ayatayi ohutayi ee kathawa kiyaganna wachana oone naha...sansare pura ekata andapu, ekata hinaunu, jiwithe beda gaththu ee dennata, sanniwedanayata hungak welawata wachana oone une naha...eka as balmakin wedanawa, sathuta, me hamadema galapaganna tharam gambauru bandimak thiyana bawa dennama danan unna...
eeth ithin anik kunu harupa poth walata wada owwanam hoda..

mema niyamu wyapruthi idiri wasare palamu karthuwa athulatha sidu kerena bawa da, me pilibandawa adhikarana sewa komishan sabhawe lekamwarayage sabhapathithwayen yuth kamituwak magin soya balana bawa da amathyansha lekamwaraya sandahan kale ya.
habayi aanduwata nam eeth therune naha.
ee wunath mama pitipassa hari baluwita owun kathawa nawaththannata ho magen mokada asannata ida athi nisa ee widihatama innata thiranaya kalemi.

awasan washayen kurusiye ana gasu jesus wahansewa nirupanaya karanane suruwamaya.

jathyanthara bauddha madhyasthanaya aarambha kara wasara 25 k gathawima nimithikara pawathwu anusmarana uthsawaye wishesha angayak lesa pawathi mema punyothsawayata shri lankawen wadama kala pujya wepathaira hemaloka pujya athapaththukakande aananda pujya mapalagama buddhasiri himi pujya rambaukwalle nandarama himi pujya welipitiye rathnasiri himi saha pransaye wadasitina pujya kongasdeniye aananda himi pujya murungagasyaye gnyanissara nahimi pujya mapalagama jinananda himi pujyasa kempane anuruddha himi athulu mahasangharathnayath wiwidhajathinta ayath dayaka dayikawanuth sahabhagi wuha.
ma kuda awadhiye sitama sama dinakama rathri kalayata siya beheth pethi kihipayak panaya kaleya.
ee kale layit thibune nane.
ee kalaya thula di mama papandu puhunukaruwan, tharaga thirakayin, kridakayin, madhya, me wage hamoma sambandha kara gena nisi sakachchawak ho wadamuluwak pawathwanawa.
methana di palibodha nashakawala adangu aasanikwala awama pramanaya kopamana da yanna pilibanda nirnayaka dima lehesi karanayak no weyi.
tika welawak yanakota niwtange ath deka ridenna gaththa.
eeth owun samajaya idiriye rangapamaka yedenawa.
numbaath ma laga man wage nihadayi
nathnam mahansi wela soshal netwarks wala sheya karanna ooni.
widuhalpathithuma nam kiyanne ee labena komis mudalen pasale duppath lamayinta sapaththu aran denawa kiyalayi.
namuth ohuge kalawa puwath path kalawath samaga aabaddha katun aakruthiye kalawak.

19 wani wyawastha sanshodhanaya anuwa parlimenthuwata, ‘amathya dhura sankhyawa wadikara ganimata’ yojanawak gena eemata nam rata thula aththa washayenma jathika aanduwak godanangi thibiya yuthuyi. 19 wani sanshodhanaya anuwa ‘jathika aanduwa yanu kumakda?’
kese namuth lankawe dawena pa්radhana pa්rashnayak wu gowijana pa්rashnaya wisanda ganimata ee pa්rathisanskarana dekama samath wuye natha.
bayit ekatawath ganta barida?
ee pilibada mulinma sthuthiyi wenna ooni.
sigiriya, polonnaruwa, awkana, ritigala dawas ganan awidinawa.
masekata dolar 10k gewala ganna sewawakuth thiyenawa.
buddhika mata nam 9 wasaredi iskole kampiyutar rum eka palathe yanna hambune na. 12 wasaredi thamayi magema kiyala ekak ganna puluwan une.
parajika ha siwuru harawima gana amathiniya thamange wishwasaya anuwa kiya pilithuru satahan kara thibenawa.
namuth ekwarama balannekuta palamuwa asa gatenne mana dekaki.
malli, mama charitha dekak neweyi..
(kolambaa, lankapuwath) – ga්ramashakthi janatha wyaparaya yatathe paudgalika anshayen madhyama palathata pa්rathilabha rasak himi weyi.

kisidaka jathyanthara mattame puhunukaruwaku lesa katayuthu nokala asanka gurusinha oostreliyawe sita pamina krikat kalamanakaruwaku lesa pathwim labimath ethan sita pradhana puhunukaruwawa siti graham fordge rajakariyata angili gasa in kallak kadagena katayuthu kirimata uthsaha kirimath wathman krikat arbudaye aarambhaye ek jawanikawak pamanaki.
ekath wenas karanna wenawalu.(samahara wita eeka godaganna bari tharamatama bindawatennath bari na)
polisiye oo ayi si mahaththaya nam kiyanne eya thamayi lu aanduwe layisan thiyena ekama ganan karaya..
me wena dewal baluwama kiyewwama api jiwathwena samajaya sighrayen kadawatemin yanawa kiyala therenawa.
eeth echchara kotanna ba ada ..
daya wijegunawardhana, mage samiya ewakata injineru shishyayek.
